item.title: Exploring English Premier League Historical Match Results
item.description: Introduction In honor of the start of a new season for the English Premier League (EPL), I am putting together this exploratory data analysis of historical EPL data to see how teams typically do to start a season. General Data Analysis # loading in the required packages suppressWarnings(suppressPackageStartupMessages({ library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) library(magrittr) library(tidyquant) library(purrr) library(ggjoy) })) First, we will load in the data. All of the data used in this analysis is from www.
